name: Break Even and Build Trust
description: Get your drone business off the ground! Your first challenge is to achieve a profit of at least ₹5,000. While doing so, ensure your customers are happy (satisfaction > 50%) and that you maintain a good reputation with customers.
target_kcs_description: Focuses on understanding basic finances (profit calculation), building initial customer trust, and recognizing early customer segments.
win_conditions_description: Profit >= ₹5000 AND Customer Satisfaction >= 50% AND Reputation >= 3.0 stars.

name: Price with Purpose
description: The market is changing! Adjust your pricing to stay competitive and fair. Aim for a profit of ₹7,500 while keeping customer satisfaction above 60%. This will require understanding your costs and local needs.
target_kcs_description: Focuses on applying pricing strategies, differentiating costs, and adapting services.

name: Lead the Team, Build the Dream
description: Time to expand! Hire your first employee. Your goal is to maintain high team morale (above 70%) and ensure all customer services are delivered on time for a week, showcasing good workforce balance.
target_kcs_description: Focuses on balancing workforce with demand, investing in training, and effective delegation.
win_conditions_description: Customer Satisfaction >= 70% AND Ethical Decision Making >= 60% AND Reputation >= 3.5 stars.

name: Make the Ethical Call
description: Growth brings new challenges. Increase your profit by ₹8,000, but it’s crucial to maintain a high ethical standing (above 80%) and avoid losing customers due to unethical practices like misinformation.
target_kcs_description: Focuses on navigating ethical dilemmas, calculated risk-taking related to business practices, and evaluating maintenance investments that impact service/safety.
win_conditions_description: Profit increase of ₹8000 AND Ethical Decision Making >= 80% AND Customer Satisfaction >= 50%.

name: Innovate and Scale
description: Look to the future! Identify a new customer group and develop a creative bundled drone service. This new offering should add ₹5,000 in revenue and boost your reputation for innovation.
target_kcs_description: Focuses on identifying new customer segments, creative problem solving for service offerings, and matching drone capabilities to diverse needs.
win_conditions_description: Revenue increase of ₹5000 from new bundle AND Reputation >= 4.0 stars AND Customer Satisfaction >= 60%.
